form.url-helptext: URL of Redmine installation (including context path).
form.textFormatting-helptext: Type of text formatting used for redmine comments.
form.autoClose-helptext: Enables the state changes function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys and issue status keywords in commit messages. If both found in a message SCM-Manager changes the state of the issue in Redmine.
form.updateIssues-helptext: Enable the automatic update function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys in commit messages. If a issue id is found SCM-Manager  updates the issue with a comment.
form.disableRepositoryConfiguration-helptext: Do not allow repository owners to configure Redmine instances.

mapping.title: Redmine status mapping
mapping.help: Map keywords to Redmine status in order to trigger state changes with those keywords.
mapping.statusHelp: Name of Redmine status which should be mapped e.g.: Closed
mapping.keywordsHelp: Comma separated list of keywords which are mapped to the Redmine status e.g.: closes, closing

redmine.description: May modify the global Redmine configuration

*.description: May modify the repository specific Redmine configuration for all repositories

redmine.description: May modify the repository specific Redmine configuration

RedmineCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.name: Redmine Issue Key Validator
RedmineCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.description: Validates for Redmine issue ids starting with "#"

RedmineCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.name: Redmine Issue Key Validator
RedmineCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.description: Use this to validate each commit message for Redmine issue ids.

branches.label: Branches
branches.helpText:
List of the branches which should be validated separated by comma. Leave blank to validate all branches.
Example: master,feature/*
